name: eevium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows eevee to upgrade last resort into extreme evoboost.
short_effect: Held: Allows Eevee to upgrade Last Resort into Extreme Evoboost.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eevee’s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eevee’s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eevee’s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
